content:
DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter Class

Definition

A class that wraps a specified writer and delegates all XmlDictionaryWriter calls to the wrapped writer.

In this Article

public class DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter : System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter
Inheritance
Object
XmlWriter
System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter
DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter

Remarks

The writer that is wrapped can be accessed through the InnerWriter property. Call the InitializeInnerWriter method to set the wrapped writer and initialize the property. You can call the InitializeTracingWriter method to set an XmlWriter to which non-canonical XML will be echoed.

Constructors

DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter()

Initializes a new instance of the DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter class.

protected DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter ();

Properties

CanCanonicalize

Returns a value indicating if the reader is capable of Canonicalization.

public override bool CanCanonicalize { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the reader is capable of Canonicalization; otherwise, false.

InnerWriter

Get the wrapped writer.

protected System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter InnerWriter { get; }
Value
System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter

Returns a XmlDictionaryWriter.

WriteState

When overridden in a derived class, gets the state of the writer.

public override System.Xml.WriteState WriteState { get; }
Value
WriteState

Returns an WriteState.

Methods

Close()

Closes the underlying stream.

public override void Close ();

EndCanonicalization()

Stops the canonicalization started by the matching stem.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.StartCanonicalization* call.

public override void EndCanonicalization ();

Flush()

Flushes the underlying stream.

public override void Flush ();

InitializeInnerWriter(XmlDictionaryWriter)

Initializes this instance with the specified inner writer.

protected void InitializeInnerWriter (System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter innerWriter);
innerWriter
System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter

The writer that is to be wrapped by this instance.

Remarks

Sets the InnerWriter property to the writer specified by the innerWriter parameter.

InitializeTracingWriter(XmlWriter)

Initializes this instance with a writer to which all calls will be echoed and that will write non-canonical XML.

protected void InitializeTracingWriter (System.Xml.XmlWriter tracingWriter);
tracingWriter
XmlWriter

A writer to which all calls will be echoed. If null, calls are not echoed.

LookupPrefix(String)

Returns the closest prefix defined in the current namespace scope for the namespace URI.

public override string LookupPrefix (string ns);
ns
String

The namespace URI whose prefix you want to find.

Returns
String

The matching prefix or null if no matching namespace URI is found in the current scope.

StartCanonicalization(Stream,Boolean,String[])

Indicates the start of canonicalization. Any write operation following this will canonicalize the data and will write it to the given stream.

public override void StartCanonicalization (System.IO.Stream stream, bool includeComments, string[] inclusivePrefixes);
stream
Stream

Stream to which the canonical stream should be written.

includeComments
Boolean

The value indicates if comments written should be canonicalized as well.

inclusivePrefixes
String[]

Set of prefixes that needs to be included into the canonical stream. The prefixes are defined at the first element that is written to the canonical stream.

WriteBase64(Byte[],Int32,Int32)

Encodes the specified binary bytes as Base64 and writes out the resulting text.

public override void WriteBase64 (byte[] buffer, int index, int count);
buffer
Byte[]

Byte array to encode.

index
Int32

The position in the buffer indicating the start of the bytes to write.

count
Int32

The number of bytes to write.

WriteCData(String)

writes out a CDATA block containing the specified text.

public override void WriteCData (string text);
text
String

The text to place inside the CDATA block.

WriteCharEntity(Char)

Forces the generation of a character entity for the specified Unicode character value.

public override void WriteCharEntity (char ch);
ch
Char

The Unicode character for which to generate a character entity.

WriteChars(Char[],Int32,Int32)

When overridden in a derived class, writes text one buffer at a time.

public override void WriteChars (char[] buffer, int index, int count);
buffer
Char[]

Character array containing the text to write.

index
Int32

The position in the buffer indicating the start of the text to write.

count
Int32

The number of characters to write.

WriteComment(String)

Writes out a comment containing the specified text.

public override void WriteComment (string text);
text
String

Text to place inside the comment.

WriteDocType(String,String,String,String)

Writes the DOCTYPE declaration with the specified name and optional attributes.

public override void WriteDocType (string name, string pubid, string sysid, string subset);
name
String

The name of the DOCTYPE. This must be non-empty.

pubid
String

If non-null it also writes PUBLIC "pubid" "sysid" where pubid and sysid are replaced with the value of the given arguments.

sysid
String

If pubid is null and sysid is non-null it writes SYSTEM "sysid" where sysid is replaced with the value of this argument.

subset
String

If non-null it writes [subset] where subset is replaced with the value of this argument.

WriteEndAttribute()

Closes the previous System.Xml.XmlWriter.WriteStartAttribute(System.String,System.String) call.

public override void WriteEndAttribute ();

WriteEndDocument()

Closes any open elements or attributes and puts the writer back in the Start state.

public override void WriteEndDocument ();

WriteEndElement()

Closes one element and pops the corresponding namespace scope.

public override void WriteEndElement ();

WriteEntityRef(String)

Writes out an entity reference as name.

public override void WriteEntityRef (string name);
name
String

The name of the entity reference.

WriteFullEndElement()

Closes one element and pops the corresponding namespace scope.

public override void WriteFullEndElement ();

WriteProcessingInstruction(String,String)

Writes out a processing instruction with a space between the name and text as follows: <?name text?>.

public override void WriteProcessingInstruction (string name, string text);
name
String

The name of the processing instruction.

text
String

The text to include in the processing instruction.

WriteRaw(String)

Writes raw markup manually from a string.

public override void WriteRaw (string data);
data
String

String containing the text to write.

WriteRaw(Char[],Int32,Int32)

When overridden in a derived class, writes raw markup manually from a character buffer.

public override void WriteRaw (char[] buffer, int index, int count);
buffer
Char[]

Character array containing the text to write.

index
Int32

The position within the buffer indicating the start of the text to write.

count
Int32

The number of characters to write.

WriteStartAttribute(String,String,String)

Writes the start of an attribute with the specified local name and namespace URI.

public override void WriteStartAttribute (string prefix, string localName, string ns);
prefix
String

The namespace prefix of the attribute.

localName
String

The local name of the attribute.

ns
String

The namespace URI for the attribute.

WriteStartDocument()

When overridden in a derived class, writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0".

public override void WriteStartDocument ();

WriteStartDocument(Boolean)

When overridden in a derived class, writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0" and the standalone attribute.

public override void WriteStartDocument (bool standalone);
standalone
Boolean

If true, it writes "standalone=yes"; if false, it writes "standalone=no".

WriteStartElement(String,String,String)

When overridden in a derived class, writes the specified start tag and associates it with the given namespace and prefix.

public override void WriteStartElement (string prefix, string localName, string ns);
prefix
String

The namespace prefix of the element.

localName
String

The local name of the element.

ns
String

The namespace URI to associate with the element.

WriteString(String)

Writes the given text content.

public override void WriteString (string text);
text
String

The text to write.

WriteSurrogateCharEntity(Char,Char)

Generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.

public override void WriteSurrogateCharEntity (char lowChar, char highChar);
lowChar
Char

The low surrogate. This must be a value between 0xDC00 and 0xDFFF.

highChar
Char

The high surrogate. This must be a value between 0xD800 and 0xDBFF.

WriteWhitespace(String)

Writes out the given white space.

public override void WriteWhitespace (string ws);
ws
String

The string of white space characters.

WriteXmlAttribute(String,String)

Writes an attribute as a xml attribute with the prefix 'xml:'.

public override void WriteXmlAttribute (string localName, string value);
localName
String

Localname of the attribute.

value
String

Attribute value.

WriteXmlnsAttribute(String,String)

Writes an xmlns namespace declaration.

public override void WriteXmlnsAttribute (string prefix, string namespaceUri);
prefix
String

The prefix of the namespace declaration.

namespaceUri
String

The namespace Uri itself.
